algorithm_technique: Traverse the linked list, doubling each digit and handling carries, potentially adding a new head node for overflow.
problem_summary_simple: Double the integer represented by a linked list and return the new linked list.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the linked list, doubling values and propagating carries, prepending a new node if the most significant digit overflows.
key_insights: The key challenge is handling the carry-over from one digit to the next.
Checking the most significant digit first (or after a first pass) simplifies carry handling.
A new head node might be required if the doubled number has more digits than the original.
